email.format: ・The format of the email address is incorrect.
email.blankFront: ・There is a space character before the email address. Please delete it.
email.blankBack: ・There is a space character after the email address. Please delete it.
email.match: ・The email addresses do not match. Please enter the same email address.

password.format: ・Please use at least three types of alphanumeric characters (uppercase and lowercase), numbers, and symbols for your password.
password.confirm: ・Passwords do not match. Please enter the same password.

mailPasswordMatch: ・The email address or password is incorrect.
phoneFormat: ・Please enter 11 digits starting from 0 without hyphens.

otpCodeFormat.report: ・The format of the result report authentication code is incorrect.

transferCodeFormat: ・Please enter the transfer code in 9-digit half-width alphanumeric characters.
patientFormat: ・Please enter the Hi-Medic ID using half-width numbers of 8 digits or less.

nameText.kanaFull: ・Please enter only full-width kana for your name (kana).
nameText.noBlank: ・Please do not enter blank characters in the name (kana).
